content.summary: Three groups of shiny flying orbs/spheres

content.detailedDescription: I took the attached picture from my house on the west edge of lawton justminutesago.  i was returning from some late night shopping at the localwal-mart andnoticed these objects in the distance moving around the skyrather erratically. when i got closer to home i realized these objects weremoving in my direction sowhen i got home i ran inside and grabbed mydigital camera.When i ran backoutside the objects were nearly overhead.  i snapped onlyone picture before theysped out of sight.
content.summary: Sighting over lawton, oklahoma

content.detailedDescription: On a hot summer night in the rual town of derby co. a space craft landed in myback yard . the year was 1966. many unexplained events occured that night . ifinterested a detailed written story can be sent to you upon request. this is nota hoax. this really happened, and evidence still exsist of this event.
content.summary: Space craft landed in back yard with physical proo

content.detailedDescription: I am a usaf security policeman with approximately 14years of flightlineexperiance. i have seen just about every aircraft light configeration there is.I was sitting guard duty on the flightline and was looking out the open windowdirectly up at the big dipper when i noticed a cresent shape of 6 lights movingfrom east to west. they appeared to be fixted to one object and not independentobjects. it took less then one minute for the object to go from directlyoverhead to the point (approx 15deg) above the western horizon where the objectmade a 90deg turn south and moved off faster then my head could follow.  elevenminutes later what i believe to have been either the space shuttle or spacestation went over golfport ms traveling from sw-nw.  i have seen the shuttle andspace station pass over in the past and this last object was consistant withthose previous oberservations.
content.summary: Saw 6 lights in cresent formation
Object of star brightness moving rapidly/eccentric
Saw cone shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I am working towards my private pilots certificate, so i was watching planestaking off from santa monica airport, from my girlfriends back yard.  i noticeda bright star moving very slowly across the sky from sw towards the nw.  then aswe were watching it, we noticed at least fifteen more.  they sometimes movedaround each other, changed direction, changed speed, and at one point an objectsplit into two objects.  they were going in different directions at the sametime and were changing speeds.  the objects seemed to have a reflective surfacelike glass that would seem to reflect the sun.  there was also one, much lower,black pod shaped object that flew quickly (within 30 seconds) from east to west,then south.  this is the second time in about six months that weve seensomething like this.  the first time we were impressed, but wrote it off fairlyquickly.  feel free to email me with any questions.
content.summary: Twice  - late afternoon ufos over los angeles
Mill valley california 231am 030802sighting by mic

content.detailedDescription: Witness states (on form 1) that he was sitting at his desk at work when helooked up at what he first thought was a plane.  he states he was not frightenedand the object then flew rapidly to the southwest out of sight.The following is from the fi report:on july 26, 1987 a security guard reported for work at 6:00 pm, his usual shifttime.  he works at a new car dealership where he has been employed for twentyodd years.  at midnight he sat down at his desk, which is located just insidethe front door, on the north side of the building.  from this vantage point hecould see the entrance drive and the north parking lot.  he noticed that the skywas filled with big fluffy white clouds that kept seperating at they moved tothe northeast.  suddenly a dark object burst from the big white clouds, movingin a straight line with the building.  he was amazed because the object remindedhim of a big stingray as he sat watching its approach toward him.  he estimatedthat the object was some thirty feet across and fifteen feet high.  he suddenlyrealized that the object was slowing as it descended.  jumping up he ran acrossthe showroom to the south exit, unlocked the door and stepped out into thefenced storage lot.  the object moved over the top of the building, glidingslowly and silently over the guard.  he gauged the altitude of the object by atree line which is some fifty feet from a chainlink fence.  the craft had tobank sharply to the right to avoid colliding with the trees.  as it banked tothe right the craft ascended at the same time it went up to an altitude ofapprox. 100 ft.  the craft then crossed over i-75.  after reaching the west sideof the expressway, it stopped and hovered about 300 ft. away from the witness.It continued to hover for four or five minutes.  it suddenly took off at aterrific rate of speed, moving to the southwest.  he said the craft was darkgrey, thirty feet wide, thirty feet long and was sporting 2 very large, orangishred, glowing lights on its rear.  when the object banked, stopped and hovered,the body looked fat at the front and tapered toward the tail, like a helicopter.There was no sound, no wings, no rotors, no windows, no other lights.  he said,"maybe it was a new plane that the air force is trying out."  at 5:58 am theobject was sighted again.  it came from the southwest, moving toward thenortheast at a high rate of speed. once again it started to slow, banked leftover the same tree line, crossed over the expressway (i-75) stopped, hoveredover the same vacant field for 11 minutes before it took off real fast to thenortheast.
content.summary: Stingray shaped object seen near clio, michigan
Black triangle flying low and very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Witness and his wife on 02feb02 were leaving the in-laws in winter haven ontheir way home.  while facing lake wales which is one town away they saw anextrememely bright lights.
content.summary: Unidentified lights, grouping & regrouping polk ct
Line of flashing light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at my grandfather lap, and we were both looking out the window during thenighttime.  suddenly we saw the object appear out of nowhere.  i thought it wasa secret airplane.  my feelings when i saw the object was fear and helpnesses. but when i looked at my grandfather face, he was smiling and was calm.  theobject was zig-zagging towards us at incredable speed.  the object colourorange-reddish.  the top half was orange.  the bottom half was red. we lost theobject when it flew over the building.
content.summary: Saw orange and reddish saucer

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at 12:30 amin a typical suburbs neighborhood, and s brightpencilular object caught my eye and i looked up 80 degrees and there was aobjectabout 9-10 feet long and as fat 3/4 of a beer keg, it was about 10-15 feetabove the telephone  it darted north and then south  then west and then east ithad very bright lights on the belly of the object, the whole scene lasted about10 seconds, both me and my dog were literealy shocked.
content.summary: I saw a very bright penciluar object, darted back

content.detailedDescription: 1.  this evening, 04 mar 2002 at approx. 1925 hours est, i was with my dog,outside of my home in the town of kane, pa. and i looked up to see an aircrafttraveling west to east. the aircraft had standard exterior lighting and itsounded like a jet. at that time i noticed the star like object crossing thepath of the aircraft (maintaining seperation).2.  the aircraft continued out ofsight, south of me traveling west to east and the jet noise was gone with it. 3.  the star looking object flew (at an aircraft like speed) southwest tonortheast with its path slightly east of my location until it was out of sightin the distant sky.4.  because it it looked star like and showed no wing tip oranticollision lights and made no sound that i could hear (unlike the manyaircraft that i see and hear daily), to me it was an unidentifiable object.5.  iremember seeing one like it traveling a similar flight path a few months ago,and though i wondered about it, i failed to note the time and date i made noreport. --  wjc
content.summary: White point of light traveling without sound over

content.detailedDescription: Summarized from fi report:witnesses were watching television in the living room of the home they share inflint, michigan.  wit.1 suddenly had a strong urge to look outside.  he walkedto the front door and looked southwest.  he was amazed to see a black helicopteror stingray shaped object hovering some 500 ft. away.  he said to wit.2, "lookat this".  wit.2 walked over and looked outside and could also see the blackoblong object hovering in the night sky.  they decided to go outdoors so theycould get a better look.  the two estimated that the object was 30 ft. long andabout 15 ft. wide.  it was hovering some 1000 ft. from the ground but veryslowly descending, stopping at approx. 750 ft. to hover again.  the object madea very slow turn, facing north, northeast, and was now facing toward thewitnesses.  they became excited, drawing attention of two neighbors.  the objectmoved closer to the witnesses.  they could see that the object was flat on thebottom, "shaped like a stingray" because the stubby little wings swept backward. the object made a very slow turn to the southeast, then turned slowly back tothe north, northeast, once again facing the witnesses.  it then made a u turn,that the witnesses described as a 135 degree turn to the left and faced west. the object then turned slowly and moved away toward the southwest, in thegeneral direction of bishop airport and the us 23 expressway.  the object put onan aerial display that lasted for approx. 15 minutes.  they viewed this objectthrough a 50x telescope.  it was noted there were 8 or 9 red lights and 3bluish-green lights beneath the crafts black body.  one of the blue-green lightsgave off a blue-greenish beam of light that was erratic.  the object gave offheat which reminded the witnesses of heat lightning. there was an odor in theair that reminded them of static electricity.  no sound was ever heard.  whenthe object disappeared, it moved to approx. 1000 ft. elevation at a 45 wswapproach, 55 ssw and moved away slowly.
content.summary: Stingray shaped object hovers near flint, michigan

content.detailedDescription: i was in my front yard listening to my cd player.I looked up at the sky and saw this black disk. at frist i though it was anairplane. when i looked at it again thats when i knew it was a ufo i was scared,shakey, nervous, my whole body was numb and lots of other things that happed.Its hard to explain what was going on with my body.The ufo was a disk shape witha dome top it was black in color.After i kept on looking at it, it took off sofast i didnt even see it take off. i scanned the sky for it but there was nosing of the ufo.
content.summary: Saw a black disks

content.detailedDescription: looking out the kitchens north window, a verybright star caught my attention.  brighter than brightest planet i everobserved.  as i was watching it, it receded northward and dimmed rapidly anddisappeared.  maximum duration ten seconds.  it travelled faster than a plane,but was definitely not a shooting star.
content.summary: Object, brighter than brightest star, receded in 1
Bright glowing red square object floating high abo

content.detailedDescription: lying in bed i heard a strong vibrating soundoutside, but didnt get up to investigate. the sound lasted for 20 -30 secondsthen faded. after that i thought i heard an airplane. a minute or two later igot up to go to my living area which has four glass sliders on the west side. isaw a very bright light in the west which seemed to be hovering over the northend of yarmouth island. i kept staring at it wondering what it could be. i triedto look at it through my binoculars, but the stabilizer needed new batteries. icouldnt hold it steady so it made the lights dance. the light was very brightand after a few seconds appeared to be rising above the trees. i thought it wascoming closer and decided to wake my husband. he arrived just in time to get aglimpse before it disappeared lowering the sky and going behind the trees on theisland. after that it was gone.
content.summary: I sighted a very bright colorful object in the wes

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten home and i was talking with my sister. when we were talking,something caught my attention. it was a very bright blinding light. my sisterasked me,  what are you looking at? i told her to look up in the sky. she saidthat it looks like the sun. i told her that it wasnt. the reason that i saidthat is because it was smaller than the sun but it was big. it was about halfthe size of the sun at a distance. then, the spacecraft landed approximately 15feet away from us. to tell you the truth, i did actually think that it was aflying object. when i first saw it, i was very excited because it was new to meand i like things that are new. the object was saucer like, it was hooveringback and forth. then it regained control and landed. i lost sight of it after ittook off.
content.summary: I was at home in my backyard.
Round white shining form orange/red up/down flame

content.detailedDescription: Death to ufos.
content.summary: Gleaming grey circular object.

content.detailedDescription: The witness was watching tv (shades in the room are kept open) when sheglanced over to the lake behind her house.  when she glanced at the water, shesaw a refection in the water that caught her eye.  she turned around andwitnessed two lights just hanging in the sky in the east/south east.  the lightswere a yellow/orange in color and circular.The two she initially saw suddenly disappeared after five minutes.  then shewitnessed two more suddenly appear and again disappear.  then there was aconfiguration of four light two to the right and two to the left groupedtogether.  after they disappeared, then three lights appeared, but they werestacked vertically.  as she has seen this before, she tired and went back towatching tv. they called their neighbors to let them know that the lights wereback again.  they didnt know that their neighbors took pictures of the lights.They verified the picture of the sighting as being what they witnessed.
content.summary: Unidentified suspicious lights, polk cty. fl

content.detailedDescription: :while in lakes wales on an investigation of a sighting i-1-740 i was informed ofneighbors who also had a sighting.  after finish said investigation i visitedneighbors.This is their account:last night while my wife was out i received a call from a neighbor to inform methat the lights we have seen in the past were back in the sky.  i looked out andsure ennough there were the same bright lights.  first there were four of themjust sitting there, not dropping like they would if they were on parachutes.  ididnt watch them all the time.  they look like powerful electric lights justhanging there together.  then there were three of them stationary and fairly lowin the sky.  a couple of years ago we saw the same thing.  the light just sitthere and they come on and then seem to just shut off without notice.  theydont go up like flares or rocket launches and you dont see contrails.  theydont make any sounds they just hang there.  they dont appear to be very faraway.  my wife was off playing cards, so i decided to use her camera even thoughi dont understand it.  i didnt think i was able to capture anything on film,but i tried anyway.  i took one photo from inside the house and then wentoutside to take the second.  i was surprised when i saw that they did come out. we do have a bombing range south of us, but these lights were east of us.  wenever see anything in the paper about them even though people have witnessedthem several times.
content.summary: Unidentified suspicious lights over polk cty. fl

content.detailedDescription: At about 19:00 hours on 02/15/02 my wife and myself were standing in front ofour house in saddlebag lake resort in lake wales, in polk county florida.  wewere in the front drive and were looking up into the north/east sky in front ofus.  we noticed a bright long tail (at first thought it was an exhaust) withthree bright long orange bars in front of it at an angle.  it continued southfor a little while towards us, then it turned to its left (east)and continuedup and away.  (not a sweeping turn)  as it turned we noticed a big circle in themiddle (silver in color and it seemed to twinkle) with two smaller circles oneach side that seemed to drop from the middle one and form a triangle.  thesmaller ones either faded out or went faster out of view.  the main one keptcontinuing in an easterly fashion until we couldnt see it anymore.  we haveseen rocket launches before, but nothing like this.  we have drawn pictures ofwhat we witnessed.
content.summary: Unidentified lights, changing configuration

content.detailedDescription: I, lunnie smith, heard a very weird constant loud noise at 12midnight for about5 minutes.  i was over my girlfriends apartment in marietta about 5-10miles fromlockheed and dobbins airforce base.  many dogs in the neighborhood barked.  itwas a clear full moon night.  very strange. what was it??? thanks
content.summary: Strange loud noise heard in marietta, georgia for

content.detailedDescription: my children and i were driving home from beaumonttx travelling west on ih-10 just before sunset when i noticed a light off in thedistance toward the nw just above tree level.  i told my kids to watch itthinking it was an airplane.......However, it never moved........Never went outof site......Just stayed in the same place.....I dont believe it was a starbecause it was still daylight in that area, and once it was dark it was nolonger there.
content.summary: Saw lighted object just before sunset
